channel.title: BoomScape Help With Owner/Admin
channel.description: I have owned multiple rsps so don't call me a nub. i just haven't run into anything like this with boomscape718. its not wanting to save me as owner or even rank me as owner even tho i am listed as it in (commands.java) (settings.java) ECT. can someone please help my skype is : purecoolbow1

item.title: BoomScape Help With Owner/Admin
item.dc:creator: @haloking0697 haloking0697
item.description:
@haloking0697 wrote:

[quote=“Project-Storm, post:5, topic:550321”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=669233.msg4475184#msg4475184 date=1425388148]
How many RSPS’s you’ve owned in the past is irrelevant here. We really don’t care to be honest.
You owning a RSPS doesn’t translate into having skill. There are plenty of owners that don’t touch the code whatsoever, they hire people to do so.

As far as I know, seeing as I don’t work on 718, you would add something like this into the login code:

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Your Username")) { rights = 2;// The designated player rights }
[/quote]

Sk8r is right, there’s people who have created, and owned ONE project and are REALLY good programmers.
Sk8r gave you the right code for 718, but BoomScape, was customly scripted, and it’s programming is different.
If you don’t actually understand Java I’d advise you not use this source.
this should help;

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Once you make this, Copy promote mod, change numbers to match your cases.[/quote]

Yes this is old but just wanted to say thank you for posting this, helped me a ton,

Read full topic

item.title: BoomScape Help With Owner/Admin
item.dc:creator: @Project-Storm Project-Storm
item.description:
@Project-Storm wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:550321”]How many RSPS’s you’ve owned in the past is irrelevant here. We really don’t care to be honest.
You owning a RSPS doesn’t translate into having skill. There are plenty of owners that don’t touch the code whatsoever, they hire people to do so.

As far as I know, seeing as I don’t work on 718, you would add something like this into the login code:

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Your Username")) { rights = 2;// The designated player rights }[/quote]

Sk8r is right, there’s people who have created, and owned ONE project and are REALLY good programmers.
Sk8r gave you the right code for 718, but BoomScape, was customly scripted, and it’s programming is different.
If you don’t actually understand Java I’d advise you not use this source.
this should help;
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=600372.0

Once you make this, Copy promote mod, change numbers to match your cases.

Read full topic
